item.title: Kick command? Doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Wow, is it really that hard?

if (command.startsWith("kick") && (playerRights == 2)) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage("Player successfully kicked"); } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
Jeeeeseee?

Read full topic

item.title: Kick command? Doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote="†Paranoia†, post:3, topic:230797"][quote author=bigh51 link=topic=303884.msg2436674#msg2436674 date=1221245709]
You did it wrong. It should be

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Staff member:" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); }
You really should learn java before you try coding something in java. I mean, it’s just common sense to learn how to do something before you try do to it.
[/quote]

Yes, If you can’t make a kick command work, You need some help X_X[/quote]

Um no… Ive released 4 sources and can code pretty well for a 14 yr old…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2008, 03:04:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“bigh51, post:2, topic:230797”]You did it wrong. It should be

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Staff member:" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); }
You really should learn java before you try coding something in java. I mean, it’s just common sense to learn how to do something before you try do to it.[/quote]
So i basically just misplaced The P rights line.

item.title: Kick command? Doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Heres my command.
This works for admins, co’s, and me, but not mods!
I cannot figure this out… pl0x help me?

At first I had this code.

if (command.startsWith("kick")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Staff member:" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); ; }
Then i thought adding the P rights would work, so I changed to this.

if (command.startsWith("kick")) { } else if (playerRights >= 1) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Staff member:" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); ; }

None will work! Please help?

Ty. ~.~Tony~.~

Read full topic
